lead_paragraph: Two young German-speaking pretenders to Novak Djokovic's tennis crown took further small steps on Wednesday toward the goal of dethroning him, comfortably seeing off experienced opponents at Wimbledon as they advance steadily up the rankings.

headline.print_headline: Young Pretenders Thiem, Zverev Map Out Path Toward Summit
headline.main: Young Pretenders Thiem, Zverev Map Out Path Toward Summit

snippet: Two young German-speaking pretenders to Novak Djokovic's tennis crown took further small steps on Wednesday toward the goal of dethroning him, comfortably seeing off experienced opponents at Wimbledon as they advance steadily up the rankings....
